sections.heading: Records of convictions and judgments; abstract of record; reports5-398
sections.text: 02.Records of convictions and judgments; abstract of record; reportsA. Each magistrate, judge or hearing officer of a court shall:1. Keep or cause to be kept a record of each violation of this article deposited with or presented
